description: This file defines theme data for a Flutter application, including light and dark themes with specific color schemes, styles, and UI component configurations.

methods.name: buildLightTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object for the light theme, configuring colors, app bar, card, button, input decorations, and navigation bar themes.

methods.name: buildDarkTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object for the dark theme, with specific color schemes and widget styles tailored for dark mode.
